name: 1DGAME
description:
You have to play for the Catcher, accidentally caught in a one-dimensional space which Lord Pixel wants to destroy.

-Plunge into the story of 1D world salvation!
-Simple game mechanics!
-Start with the stupidly slow difficulty and reach the incredible one!
-Complete 16 standard levels and 6 special levels!
-Beat LORD PIXEl and save 1D WORLD!
